it_CH {
    LocaleID { "0810" }
    LocaleString { "it_CH" }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            "'",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;\u00A4-#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "CHE" }
    localPatternChars { "GuMtkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "H.mm' h' z",
                    "HH:mm:ss z",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm",
                    "EEEE, d. MMMM yyyy",
                    "d. MMMM yyyy",
                    "d-MMM-yyyy",
                    "dd.MM.yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
